name: Projected Dreams
description:
Fulfill the shadow girl's wishes by dragging the children's toys from the shelves and dropping them onto the table. Recreate silhouettes close to the template in the spotlight to complete the level. Once you completed the game, you're free to create your own unique object silhouettes!  Thank you so much for playing our game! This game was developed by team strawberry Coding – Robin Good
Technical Artist – Lorenz Kleiser
3D Artist – Luca Imesch
2D Artist & Sound – Dana Senn Made for Brackeys Game Jam
